nodes.bodyText: Didn't know about the stream API. Thanks really helpful! Ended out using a method since there was a bit much logic for a one liner.
for code style reasons we use {} always
Ended up going with a TextField instead. The ComboBox was confusing as you could end up seeing values that didn't match what you were typing.
We avoid var for code style reasons
Being explicit is better. I agree
Translations are made on poeditor.com don't ever commit changes to message properties file other than the English one
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -793,4 +793,5 @@ settings.general.startTab = Starter "Tab"
 startTab.selectTab = Wählen Sie den "Tab", mit dem Sie beginnen möchten\:
 startTab.message = Hier können Sie den "Tab" auswählen, mit dem der Client startet. Sie können dies später in den Einstellungen ändern, wenn Sie möchten.
 startTab.save = Speichern
-vault.replays.onlyShowLastYear = Nur ein Jahr alte
\ No newline at end of file
+vault.replays.onlyShowLastYear = Nur ein Jahr alte
+chat.filter.countryPrompt=Country

nodes.bodyText: Roger that. I have removed the changes for the localized files.
